docs.title: Welcome to the Li Family
docs.text:
Welcome to our family website! This is a place where we share our stories, memories, and stay connected. We are a family of four living in the Greater Seattle Area, working in tech, and enjoying life's adventures together.

Learn About Our Family

Quick Facts

Location: Greater Seattle Area, WA

Family Size: 4 members

Careers: Technology & Innovation

Values: Family, Growth, Learning

docs.title: Parents
docs.text:
• Yuanxi Li

    Staff Software Engineer @ Apple

    10+ years of experience leading technical teams and building high-impact products. Currently leading media management for Apple Music, Apps, TV, and Fitness.

    Full Profile LinkedIn

  • Jingya Zhang

    Backend Software Engineer @ Amazon

    8+ years of experience building scalable systems. Currently leading core features and systems for Amazon across different teams.

    Full Profile LinkedIn

docs.title: Our Children
docs.text:
• Jasper Li

    Our wonderful son who brings joy and energy to our family every day. Curious, creative, and always eager to learn new things.

    Learn More

  • Yris Li

    Our amazing daughter who fills our lives with laughter and love. Bright, imaginative, and has a wonderful spirit.

    Learn More

docs.title: About Us
docs.text:
The Li family is a close-knit family that values:

  • Family bonds - Staying connected across distances and cherishing time together
  • Shared memories - Preserving our stories, photos, and experiences
  • Tradition - Honoring our heritage while embracing the future
  • Growth - Supporting each other's dreams, learning, and aspirations

docs.title: Our Story
docs.text:
Our Journey

Every family has a unique journey, and ours is filled with love, laughter, and countless precious moments. From our roots in China to building our lives in the Greater Seattle Area, we've created a home filled with technology, innovation, and family values. Each chapter has shaped who we are as a family, and we're excited for all the adventures ahead.

docs.title: Family Values
docs.text:
What We Believe In

Love & RespectUnityCommunicationHeritageFuture

We treat each other with kindness, understanding, and unconditional love. Our family is built on mutual respect and support for one another.

We stand together through thick and thin. Whether celebrating successes or facing challenges, we face life as a team.

We keep open and honest dialogue, sharing our thoughts, dreams, and concerns with each other.

We celebrate our Chinese roots and pass down our traditions while embracing our American experiences.

We invest in education, personal growth, and building a better tomorrow for the next generation.

docs.title: What We Do
docs.text:
• Professional Life

    Both parents work in the Seattle tech industry, contributing to innovation at Apple and Amazon while maintaining work-life balance.

  • Education

    We prioritize learning and education, with advanced degrees from Rutgers and NJIT, and supporting our children's educational journeys.

  • Community

    Living in the Greater Seattle Area, we enjoy the Pacific Northwest lifestyle, tech community, and diverse culture.

  • Family Time

    We cherish quality time together, whether it's exploring local attractions, family dinners, or simply enjoying each other's company.

  • Latest Updates

    Stay informed with the latest family news, milestones, and announcements

  • Upcoming Events

    Check out planned family gatherings, celebrations, and special occasions

  • Family Stories

    Read and share stories, memories, and experiences from all family members

"Family is not an important thing. It's everything." - Michael J. Fox

docs.title: Jasper Li
docs.text:
Our Son

Growing, Learning, Exploring | Future Innovator

docs.title: About Jasper
docs.text: Jasper is our wonderful son who brings joy and energy to our family every day. He is curious, creative, and always eager to learn new things. We nurture his natural curiosity and support his journey of discovery and growth.

docs.title: Our Vision for Jasper
docs.text:
Growing Into His Best Self

Character DevelopmentAcademic ExcellenceCreative ExpressionSocial & Emotional Growth

Building Strong Values

  • Developing kindness, empathy, and respect for others
  • Learning responsibility and independence
  • Cultivating resilience and perseverance
  • Practicing gratitude and mindfulness

Fostering Love of Learning

  • Encouraging curiosity and critical thinking
  • Supporting STEM interests and exploration
  • Developing strong literacy and communication skills
  • Embracing challenges as opportunities to grow

Nurturing Imagination

  • Exploring arts, music, and creative activities
  • Building problem-solving skills through play
  • Expressing ideas and emotions through various mediums
  • Developing unique talents and interests

Building Relationships

  • Developing strong friendships
  • Learning to work in teams
  • Understanding and managing emotions
  • Building confidence and self-esteem

docs.title: Interests & Passions
docs.text:
• Play & Exploration

    • Outdoor adventures and nature exploration
    • Building and construction activities
    • Sports and physical activities
    • Games that challenge the mind

  • Learning Journey

    • Currently attending Eton School
    • Previously at Primrose School of Bellevue
    • Favorite subject: Painting
    • Growing academically and socially

  • Creative Pursuits

    • Arts and crafts projects
    • Music and rhythm
    • Imaginative storytelling
    • Building and creating

  • Growing Skills

    • Problem-solving abilities
    • Leadership qualities
    • Communication skills
    • Tech literacy

docs.title: What Makes Jasper Special
docs.text:
His Unique Qualities

Jasper has a wonderful curiosity about the world around him. He approaches new experiences with enthusiasm and isn't afraid to ask questions. His creative problem-solving abilities shine through in everything he does, from building projects to finding innovative solutions to challenges.

He shows kindness and empathy toward others, making friends easily and caring deeply about his family. His determination and resilient spirit help him tackle challenges with confidence and learn from every experience.

docs.title: Learning & Development
docs.text:
Our Approach

We believe in:

  • Hands-on Learning: Learning through experience, exploration, and play
  • Following Interests: Supporting his natural curiosities and passions
  • Balanced Growth: Nurturing academic, social, emotional, and physical development
  • Growth Mindset: Celebrating effort, embracing mistakes as learning opportunities
  • Future Ready: Preparing him for a world of innovation and change

docs.title: Milestones & Achievements
docs.text:
Celebrating Growth

  • Academic: [Add specific achievements]
  • Social: Building strong friendships and teamwork skills
  • Creative: [Add creative accomplishments]
  • Character: Showing kindness, responsibility, and resilience
  • Skills: [Add skill development milestones]

docs.title: Looking Forward
docs.text:
Our Hope for Jasper

We hope Jasper grows into a confident, kind, and curious individual who:

  • Pursues his passions with enthusiasm
  • Treats others with respect and empathy
  • Embraces challenges as opportunities
  • Makes a positive impact on the world
  • Never stops learning and growing
  • Stays true to himself

docs.title: Photo Gallery
docs.text:
Coming Soon

Photos and memories of Jasper's adventures and milestones will be added here.

Parent's Message

"Jasper, you make us proud every day. Your curiosity lights up our world, your kindness touches our hearts, and your determination inspires us. Keep exploring, keep learning, keep being the amazing person you are. We believe in you and can't wait to see all the wonderful things you'll do."

docs.title: About Jingya Zhang
docs.text:
Professional Profile

Backend Software Engineer @ Amazon | 8+ Years Experience | System Design Expert

docs.title: Summary
docs.text: Backend engineer with 8+ years of experience delivering high-impact, scalable systems. Strong in API design, backend optimization, and driving solutions from concept to production. Proven track record of building customer-facing features that serve millions of users.

docs.title: Current Role
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer Amazon - Delivery Experience | Greater Seattle Area October 2024 - Present

  • Leading core Eligibility system for Add-To-Delivery feature enabling customers to add items to existing orders with consolidated/same-time delivery
  • Designed and built layered eligibility APIs covering customer eligibility, product offer eligibility, and order-based eligibility
  • Driving high-impact solutions that enhance customer delivery experience

docs.title: Career Highlights
docs.text:
Experience

Technical LeadershipBackend ExpertiseImpact
  • Led core eligibility systems for Amazon delivery features
  • Re-designed inventory planning auditing workflow at scale
  • Migrated critical services from legacy infrastructure to AWS
  • Drove solutions from concept through production
  • Expert in API design and distributed systems
  • Specialized in microservices and event-driven architecture
  • Strong focus on scalability and system reliability
  • Large-scale data processing and optimization
  • Built multimodal features serving millions of Alexa users
  • Enabled voice-enabled checkout and in-store shopping experiences
  • Shipped company-wide security services for 70,000+ AWS accounts
  • Streamlined workflows reducing reactive fire-drills

docs.title: Amazon - Delivery Experience
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer | October 2024 - Present

  • Led core Eligibility system for Add-To-Delivery feature
  • Designed layered eligibility APIs for customer, product, and order eligibility
  • Enhanced customer delivery experience with consolidated order capabilities

docs.title: Amazon - Supply Chain Optimization Technology
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer | January 2024 - October 2024

  • Re-designed Amazon Retail inventory planning auditing workflow improving validation speed
  • Sped up validation cycles and reduced reactive fire-drills
  • Enabled self-serve automation and CI/CD deployment flows

docs.title: Amazon - Alexa Shopping
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer | May 2019 - January 2024

Key Features Built:

  • Multimodal Shopping Experience - Designed and shipped voice + UI features for Alexa enabling real-time item availability and store location info for Whole Foods and Amazon Fresh
  • "Alexa, does Whole Foods have cherry tomatoes in stock?"

  • "Alexa, where can I find mint-flavor chocolate at Fresh?"

  • Voice-Enabled Checkout - Built multimodal checkout on Alexa (previously only available on web/mobile)

  • "Alexa, checkout."

  • In-Store Mode - Built voice-enabled in-store mode for mobile app to streamline Fresh/Whole Foods checkout with Prime pricing

  • "Alexa, take me to in-store mode."

  • Infrastructure Migration - Led migration of service from legacy infrastructure to AWS (ECS + DynamoDB), boosting reliability and scalability

docs.title: Amazon - Consumer Cloud Security
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer | May 2017 - May 2019

  • Shipped company-wide services for security monitoring, violation detection, and risk analysis across 70,000+ AWS accounts
  • Worked on enterprise permission management integrated with HR system supporting ~950,000 users with hierarchical RBAC

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
Academic Background

M.S. Computer Engineering (GPA: 3.75/4.0) New Jersey Institute of Technology

docs.title: Skills & Expertise
docs.text:
• Programming

    Java, JavaScript, SQL

  • Cloud & Infrastructure

    AWS (ECS, EC2, DynamoDB, Lambda), Docker, CI/CD

  • Backend & Architecture

    Distributed Systems, Microservices, Event-Driven Architecture, Spring

  • Data & Tools

    Large-scale Data Processing, Git, System Optimization

docs.title: Interests & Passions
docs.text:
Beyond Work

  • System Design - Passionate about building scalable, reliable systems
  • Innovation - Driving solutions from concept to production
  • Learning - Continuously exploring new technologies and best practices
  • Family - Balancing professional excellence with quality family time

docs.text:
Professional Links

  • LinkedIn
  • Email

Professional Philosophy

"Build scalable systems that solve real problems and delight customers."

docs.title: Yris Li
docs.text:
Our Daughter

Bright, Creative, Compassionate | Future Leader

docs.title: About Yris
docs.text: Yris is our amazing daughter who fills our lives with laughter and love. She is bright, imaginative, and has a wonderful spirit that lights up every room. We celebrate her individuality and support her journey of self-discovery and growth.

docs.title: Our Vision for Yris
docs.text:
Growing Into Her Best Self

Character DevelopmentAcademic ExcellenceCreative ExpressionSocial & Emotional Growth

Building Strong Values

  • Developing kindness, compassion, and respect for all
  • Learning responsibility and self-confidence
  • Cultivating resilience and courage
  • Practicing gratitude and mindfulness

Fostering Love of Learning

  • Encouraging curiosity and inquiry
  • Supporting interests in arts, sciences, and humanities
  • Developing strong communication and literacy skills
  • Embracing challenges with a growth mindset

Nurturing Imagination

  • Exploring arts, music, dance, and creative activities
  • Building creative problem-solving skills
  • Expressing ideas and emotions authentically
  • Developing unique talents and passions

Building Relationships

  • Developing meaningful friendships
  • Learning empathy and emotional intelligence
  • Understanding and expressing emotions healthily
  • Building leadership and collaboration skills

docs.title: Interests & Passions
docs.text:
• Play & Exploration

    • Creative play and imaginative adventures
    • Outdoor exploration and nature activities
    • Dancing and movement
    • Activities that spark joy

  • Learning Journey

    • Currently attending KLA Schools of Bellevue
    • Favorite activity: Soccer
    • Exploring new ideas and concepts
    • Growing through play-based learning

  • Creative Pursuits

    • Arts and crafts
    • Music and performance
    • Creative writing and storytelling
    • Design and aesthetics

  • Growing Skills

    • Creative thinking
    • Communication abilities
    • Emotional intelligence
    • Collaborative spirit

docs.title: What Makes Yris Special
docs.text:
Her Unique Qualities

Yris has a bright and vibrant spirit that brings joy to everyone around her. Her creative imagination knows no bounds, transforming ordinary moments into magical adventures. She approaches the world with wonder and enthusiasm, always eager to discover something new.

Her compassionate heart and empathy for others make her a natural friend and helper. She shows courage in trying new things and resilience when facing challenges. Her unique perspective and creative thinking make her contributions truly special.

docs.title: Learning & Development
docs.text:
Our Approach

We believe in:

  • Child-Centered Learning: Honoring her unique interests, strengths, and learning style
  • Creative Exploration: Providing opportunities for artistic expression and innovation
  • Whole Child Development: Nurturing emotional, social, physical, and cognitive growth
  • Joyful Learning: Making learning an adventure filled with discovery and wonder
  • Authentic Expression: Encouraging her to be herself and express her unique voice
  • Empowering Growth: Building confidence and competence through supportive challenges

docs.title: Milestones & Achievements
docs.text:
Celebrating Growth

  • Academic: [Add specific achievements]
  • Social: Developing deep friendships and social awareness
  • Creative: [Add creative accomplishments]
  • Character: Demonstrating kindness, courage, and authenticity
  • Skills: [Add skill development milestones]

docs.title: Looking Forward
docs.text:
Our Hope for Yris

We hope Yris grows into a confident, compassionate, and creative individual who:

  • Pursues her dreams with courage and determination
  • Uses her voice to make a positive difference
  • Embraces her unique gifts and talents
  • Treats others with kindness and respect
  • Faces challenges with resilience and grace
  • Lives authentically and joyfully
  • Never stops creating and imagining

docs.title: Photo Gallery
docs.text:
Coming Soon

Photos and memories of Yris's adventures and special moments will be added here.

Parent's Message

"Yris, you light up our lives with your creativity, your laughter, and your beautiful spirit. Your imagination inspires us, your kindness moves us, and your courage amazes us. Keep shining, keep creating, keep being the wonderful person you are. We love you beyond measure and can't wait to see all the beautiful things you'll bring to the world."

docs.title: About Yuanxi Li
docs.text:
Professional Profile

Staff Software Engineer @ Apple | 10+ Years Experience | Technical Leader

docs.title: Summary
docs.text: Experienced Software Development Engineer with 10+ years of experience in designing, building, and delivering high-quality software products. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and driving successful project deliveries. Skilled in agile methodologies, micro-services architecture, and cloud computing technologies.

docs.title: Current Role
docs.text:
Staff Software Development Engineer Apple Inc. | Greater Seattle Area April 2021 - Present

  • Leading the media management org of 10+ engineers, partnering with Apple Media Business to deliver high-quality media products
  • Designed and built new micro-apps from scratch for Apple Editors to manage image & video across Music, Apps, TV, and Fitness
  • Explored & built an auto-video generator using FFMPEG, Lottie, and LLM-based KeyFramer for personalized video creation
  • Drive cross-functional business discussions, decisions, and conflict resolution

docs.title: Career Highlights
docs.text:
Experience

LeadershipTechnical ExpertiseImpact
  • Led media management org of 10+ engineers at Apple
  • Mentored 5+ junior engineers at AWS
  • Drove cross-functional alignment across multiple Apple product teams
  • Managed technical roadmaps and phased delivery goals
  • Designed greenfield initiatives and built products from zero to launch
  • Expert in micro-services architecture and cloud computing
  • Specialized in media processing (FFMPEG, Lottie, CUDA GPU)
  • Full-stack development across multiple platforms
  • Boosted AWS Billing Console adoption by 500%
  • Drove +300% revenue increase in AWS China Region
  • Led multiple high-impact projects serving millions of users
  • Automated media workflows across Music, App Store, iTunes, TV+, Fitness+, Vision Pro

docs.title: Apple Inc.
docs.text:
Staff Software Development Engineer | April 2021 - Present

Key Achievements:

  • Media Task Orchestration (2025) - Led 10+ engineers to build a greenfield initiative to manage media tasks across internal/external users
  • Motion Automation (2024) - Built new product from zero to launch; designed animation rendering system enabling editors to add effects and modify content; cut rendering time by migrating from CPU to CUDA GPU
  • Media Workflow Platform (2023) - Led 4+ engineers to launch workflow automating uploading/editing/reviewing/publishing media across multiple Apple platforms
  • Database Migration (2022) - Led 5+ engineers to migrate multiple Apple media microservices from Oracle to MongoDB

docs.title: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
docs.text:
Software Development Engineer II | February 2017 - March 2021

  • Built AWS Budgets, Budgets Report, Expiration Alerts, FreeTier, and Action from scratch to enable cost controls for customers
  • Boosted AWS Billing Console adoption by 500% through product launches
  • Led cost control platform launch in China Region, driving +300% revenue increase
  • Owned AWS Budgets History, Budgets Reports, AWS Action features end-to-end
  • Mentored 5+ junior engineers

Key Achievements:

  • AWS FreeTier (2021) - Automated onboarding of new AWS products into FreeTier; collaborated with 40+ teams
  • AWS Action (2020) - Shipped AWS Action feature for cost-based usage control; released new AWS SDK + Console experience
  • China Region Launch (2019) - Launched cost control platform in China; increased revenue by 300%; broke monolith into micro-services
  • AWS Budgets Report (2019) - Launched product to provide periodic budget reviews
  • Database Migration (2018) - Migrated team data from Oracle to DynamoDB

docs.title: Amazon
docs.text: Software Development Engineer Intern | June 2016 - August 2016

docs.title: Rudraya
docs.text: Software Engineer | August 2015 - January 2016

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
Academic Background

Master of Computer Engineering Rutgers University, New Brunswick

B.S. Computer Engineering University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

docs.title: Skills & Expertise
docs.text:
• Programming Languages

    Java, Python, Scala, NodeJS

  • Cloud & Infrastructure

    AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, MongoDB, Oracle

  • Media Technologies

    FFMPEG, Lottie, CUDA GPU

  • Frameworks & Tools

    Spring, Guice, Micro-services Architecture

docs.title: Interests & Passions
docs.text:
Beyond Work

  • Continuous Learning - Always exploring new technologies and LLM applications
  • Mentorship - Helping junior engineers grow in their careers
  • Innovation - Building products from zero to launch
  • Family Time - Balancing career with quality family moments

Professional Philosophy

"Build high-quality products that make a difference, lead with empathy, and never stop learning."

docs.title: Family Calendar
docs.text:
Stay Updated

Keep track of important family events, celebrations, and gatherings. Family members can add events directly to our shared Google Calendar below!

docs.title: Live Family Calendar
docs.text:
Interactive Calendar - Add & Edit Events

How to Add Events:

  1. Click on any date in the calendar below
  2. Sign in with your Google account (if prompted)
  3. Add event details (title, time, location, description)
  4. Save the event - it will appear for all family members!

How to Edit Events:

  • Click on any existing event to view details
  • If you have permission, you can edit or delete events
  • Contact Yuanxi or Jingya to request calendar edit access

docs.title: How to Stay Updated
docs.text:
Never Miss an Event

Website Updates

  • Check this calendar page regularly for new events
  • Events are updated as they are planned

Contact Us

  • Email us to RSVP or get event details
  • Reach out with questions about upcoming events

Add Your Events

  • Family members can suggest events and dates
  • Contact us to add important dates to the calendar

docs.title: Past Events & Memories
docs.text:
Looking Back

This section will feature highlights and photos from past family events and celebrations. Check back soon for updates!

docs.title: Event Planning Tips
docs.text:
• RSVP Early

    Help us plan better by confirming your attendance as soon as possible

  • Bring & Share

    Feel free to bring dishes, desserts, or items to share with the family

  • Capture Moments

    Don't forget to take photos and share them with the family

  • Stay Connected

    Contact us if you need directions, have questions, or need to make changes

"The best thing to hold onto in life is each other." - Audrey Hepburn

docs.title: The Li Family Foundation
docs.text:
Our Mission

Empowering communities through education, innovation, and compassionate giving.

Impact Since 2024

Since our founding in 2024, the Li Family Foundation has contributed $10,000+ to educational institutions and community programs, supporting excellence in education and cultural enrichment.

docs.title: Support Our Mission
docs.text:
Make a Donation

Your contribution helps us continue our mission of empowering communities through education and innovation. Every donation makes a meaningful impact.

Donate via GoFundMe

docs.title: About the Foundation
docs.text: The Li Family Foundation is dedicated to making a positive impact through strategic philanthropy, community engagement, and support for causes that align with our values. We believe in giving back and creating opportunities for others to thrive.

docs.title: Our Focus Areas
docs.text:
• Education

    Supporting educational initiatives, scholarships, and programs that empower learners of all ages

    Key Initiatives:

    • STEM education programs
    • Scholarship opportunities
    • Educational technology access
    • Literacy programs

  • Innovation & Technology

    Fostering innovation and technological advancement for social good

    Key Initiatives:

    • Tech literacy programs
    • Coding bootcamps for underserved communities
    • Innovation grants
    • Mentorship programs

  • Community Support

    Building stronger communities through direct support and engagement

    Key Initiatives:

    • Food security programs
    • Housing support
    • Community centers
    • Emergency relief

  • Youth Development

    Investing in the next generation through programs and opportunities

    Key Initiatives:

    • Youth mentorship
    • After-school programs
    • Summer camps
    • Leadership development

docs.title: Our Values
docs.text:
Guiding Principles

Impact-DrivenCommunity-FocusedInnovationTransparencyCollaboration

Measurable Change

We focus on initiatives that create lasting, measurable impact in the communities we serve. Every dollar donated is invested thoughtfully to maximize positive outcomes.

Local & Global

While we support local Seattle-area initiatives, we also extend our reach to communities worldwide, with special attention to underserved populations.

Forward-Thinking

We embrace innovative approaches to philanthropy, leveraging technology and modern solutions to traditional challenges.

Open & Accountable

We maintain transparency in our operations and impact reporting, ensuring donors and partners understand how resources are utilized.

Partnership

We believe in working together with other organizations, volunteers, and community leaders to amplify our impact.

docs.title: The Eton School Foundation
docs.text:
Annual Education Support

The Li Family Foundation proudly contributes to The Eton School Foundation every year, supporting innovative educational programs and opportunities for students. Our partnership reflects our commitment to excellence in education and nurturing the next generation of leaders.

Partnership Since: Ongoing annual commitment

Focus Areas: - Educational excellence programs - Student enrichment activities - Faculty development - Campus improvements

Learn More About Eton School

docs.title: Local Museum Programs
docs.text:
Cultural & Arts Support

We contribute to multiple local museum programs throughout the Greater Seattle Area, supporting arts education, cultural preservation, and community access to enriching experiences.

Supported Institutions: - Seattle Art Museum programs - Museum of History & Industry (MOHAI) - Pacific Science Center educational initiatives - Children's museum family access programs

Focus Areas: - Free community access days - Educational programming - Youth art programs - Cultural exhibitions
